placeInfo: {'id': '14106301', 'name': 'Marino Beach Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1679, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.899862, 'longitude': 79.85152, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d14106301-Reviews-Marino_Beach_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.marinobeach.com', 'address': '590 Marine Drive, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '590 Marine Drive', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 51, 'count2': 32, 'count3': 58, 'count4': 218, 'count5': 1320}}
text: Our stay at Marino Beach Hotel was pleasant, with the hotel boasting a beautiful, European-style hall and a convenient connection to the Marino Shopping Center. This provided easy access to a variety of shopping options directly from the hotel. While the room appeared clean at first glance, we did encounter some cleanliness issues, such as nail clippings on the terrace, hair on the towels, and stains on the bed's headboard. However, the location was perfect, close to the city center with tuk-tuks readily available, and a 30-minute walk to the main attractions. We dined at the Chinese restaurant in the shopping center and enjoyed a drink at the hotel's Ocean Grill, both of which were enjoyable. The rooftop facilities were stunning, although we didn't have time to use them. Overall, a good stay with a few cleanliness issues that need attention.
title: Good stay but room cleaning needs improving

placeInfo: {'id': '456049', 'name': 'Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 8248, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.929096, 'longitude': 79.84964, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d456049-Reviews-Cinnamon_Lakeside_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.cinnamonlakeside.com', 'address': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 108, 'count2': 116, 'count3': 278, 'count4': 1094, 'count5': 6652}}
roomTip: This is a great hotel to explore Colombo. Don’t miss the local restaurants and pubs that surround the hotel, it’s amazing
text:
Our stay at the **Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel** in Colombo was nothing short of exceptional, and we were fortunate enough to stay here twice—once when we first landed in Colombo, and later when we had a layover before our flight the following day. Both times, the experience was truly memorable, and this hotel has now become one of our favorites.

Nestled beautifully on the bank of **Beira Lake**, the hotel’s location is perfect, offering a peaceful oasis right in the heart of the city. Surrounded by the modern skyline of high-rise buildings, including other major hotels, the view from this property is simply breathtaking. It is a stunning blend of urban sophistication and natural beauty, and the moment we arrived, we felt the luxurious yet welcoming atmosphere.

The check-in process was impressively smooth and high-tech, handled entirely on an iPad, which was a refreshing experience. Special thanks to the young trainee, **Mr. Dulimina**, and his manager, **Mr. John**, who went above and beyond to offer us a lake-view room. Their hospitality was top-notch, and we were thrilled with our room.

The room itself was spacious and pristine, offering a spectacular view of the **swimming pool**, **Beira Lake**, and the majestic **Lotus Tower**, which can be seen in all its grandeur, especially at night when it lights up in dazzling colors. The nighttime view of the Lotus Tower from our room was simply enchanting, making the entire stay feel magical.

The housekeeping team did a fantastic job, keeping the room spotless throughout our stay. We were especially happy with the attentive service, as we were provided with water bottles whenever we needed them, even late into the evening.

The **breakfast and dinner** experiences were absolutely WOW! The **Sri Lankan cuisine**—both vegetarian and non-vegetarian—was superb, and the hotel’s elaborate menu of **Indian, Asian, and Italian** dishes left us spoilt for choice. Every meal was a delightful treat, and we truly enjoyed the variety and the delicious flavors.

One of the best things about this hotel is its **central location**. It’s close to local pubs, restaurants, and popular tourist spots like the **Dutch Museum**, which was one of our favorites to explore. Another highlight for us was the **live music** played at the bar, located right in the lobby. Sipping drinks while enjoying the tunes and overlooking the swimming pool made for the perfect relaxing evening.

During our stay, we also had the pleasure of experiencing some amazing events. One memorable night was the **Saturday dance and fun event** hosted by the hotel. It’s a plush event for outside guests, but for hotel guests, entry is free—though drinks are extra. It was a great way to wind down and enjoy the lively atmosphere. As a bonus, we had the chance to meet members of the **Sri Lanka and Bangladesh women’s cricket teams**, who were staying at the hotel, and we even witnessed a beautiful **Sri Lankan wedding** taking place. These unexpected extras added so much to our experience, making it all the more memorable.

Finally, we have to extend a big thank you to **Joshua**, **Tharushi**, and **Madhushikha** from the restaurant, who welcomed us with such warmth and smiles every time we dined there. Their kindness and service made our stay even more enjoyable.

Overall, our experience at Cinnamon Lakeside was absolutely wonderful, and we will **definitely return** to stay here again. The hotel’s mix of luxurious comfort, superb location, and outstanding hospitality has won us over. We can't wait to come back!
title: An unforgettable experience at Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel, Colombo

text:
Stayed at the Cinnamon Lakeside for 6 days on some what official work. Had the luck of getting a room with the view of the Lake and most mornings I get up early and watch the lake sipping a cup of tea. 
Great room service and house keeping. Always there to help us when ever we want some thing. 
The Hotel is located in a convenient spot for all my work that I had to do. Further Galle Face Green is close by and I had the chance of going there to do the evening walks for 45 minutes. 
I never missed having an egg hopper and milk rice in the morning. Loved watching on how the staff used to break the egg to add to the plain hopper and I am trying it now at home.
title: Great Experience and cherish the memories

placeInfo: {'id': '456049', 'name': 'Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 8248, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.929096, 'longitude': 79.84964, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d456049-Reviews-Cinnamon_Lakeside_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.cinnamonlakeside.com', 'address': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 108, 'count2': 116, 'count3': 278, 'count4': 1094, 'count5': 6652}}
text:
I travel to Colombo for business often, and the Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel is one of my favourite places to stay in Colombo. I like the central location of the hotel, and the service is generally excellent. Unfortunately, during my last stay, my experience of the quality of service was not what I usually have received, because of the Cinnamon Lakeside hotel driver I hired.

The hotel provided a car with a driver called Nalaka Jailat. He was rude and arrogant, for no reason - speaking in an unprofessional way, refusing to get out of the car to help with any bags or luggage. In addition to this, the driver kept asking me for money, to repair his motorcycle. When I didn’t give him the money, he became hostile and aggressive. Other Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel drivers had been good, and there had been no issues previously.  

I still like the hotel otherwise and will continue to visit, but the behaviour of this driver is very off-putting and unprofessional. The hotel staff have always been friendly and polite. The hotel should not employ a person like this driver Nalaka Jailat, an employee who lets down the reputation of an otherwise great hotel.
title: Great hotel, terrible drivers

text:
I always love dining at Cinnamon Lakeside, but this visit was extra special. I had initially planned to celebrate my mother’s birthday in Malaysia, but when our plans changed, I immediately thought of this hotel. Despite the last-minute arrangement, I reached out, and Christina Rajaratnam from the staff went above and beyond to organize a beautiful celebration for my mother. She was incredibly helpful, and I genuinely appreciate the effort she put in to make our day unforgettable.

The rest of the team was also fantastic, but Christina’s dedication and willingness to go out of her way truly stood out. Her exceptional service is a real asset to Cinnamon Lakeside. Thank you again to all the restaurant staff for making my mother’s birthday a wonderful and memorable experience!
title: "Wonderful Birthday Celebration Thanks to Outstanding Service!"

placeInfo: {'id': '456049', 'name': 'Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 8248, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.929096, 'longitude': 79.84964, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d456049-Reviews-Cinnamon_Lakeside_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.cinnamonlakeside.com', 'address': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 108, 'count2': 116, 'count3': 278, 'count4': 1094, 'count5': 6652}}
text:
Be careful solo travelling in Colombo 
Staff lovely  on my first day to go and secure my train tickets the chef walked me all the way to fort Colombo.  Chatting away and made me feel very safe. As he left me it was then a catalogue of disasters.  You are approached so many times .. there is a festival that ends in 20 minutes etc.  and how every street savvy you are. ( I told this guy I have no money etc ) once you are in that tuk tuk. They have you.  I got taken to a museum. Then to a cash machine where they demanded money.  I ended up giving 20 usd and just walking away telling them to ….. off.   After being dropped in the middle of nowhere I headed back to the hotel and it kept happening.  People approaching you telling you a festival was nearly over and that they must take you there.    I waved off all the rest.  And feeling quite unnerved headed back to the hotel
I then used the hotel  gym. Sauna.   And was very glad that I was staying  in a nice hotel.  
Lessons …. If I went again. Prebook with get your guide a tuk tuk to take you round the sights. 
Don’t get in a random tuk tuk without agreeing a price 
On needing to get to the station the following day I could either get a taxi from the hotel which was very expensive or give it a go with a random tuk tuk.   I walked !!!!!
So hotel great. Facilities great. They could work on being able to facilitate some of your travel needs.  Ie have tuks tuks that they trust
title: Great hotel.  Colombo be careful

placeInfo: {'id': '456049', 'name': 'Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 8248, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.929096, 'longitude': 79.84964, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d456049-Reviews-Cinnamon_Lakeside_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.cinnamonlakeside.com', 'address': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '115 Sir Chittampalam A Gardiner Mawatha', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 108, 'count2': 116, 'count3': 278, 'count4': 1094, 'count5': 6652}}
text:
I have been a regular visitor to Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel for many years , for the good reason that it is nice , small comfortable, yet a 5 Star. 

 I am 81 yrs old, and travel from Ontario ,Canada  to Sri Lanka, my country of birth, that   left  52 yrs ago .
 I call Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel -- ' My Home in Colombo ' for good reason.

 Location -- close to Gangarama Temple, Galle Face Green etc. Beira lake with its magical views at all times of the day, bird watching, lovely clean , well maintained Swimming pool-- are  All Special Attractions to me . 

 The Staff-- exceptionally friendly and  helpful .
                 Front Desk Staff -Jeevani Perera- Firzaad Dawood ,  Nathalie ,

  Chief Conciearge- Gamini Fernando and all his assistants .

 Dining Room Staff- Vinoli, Desus , Yohann ,  Madushika, Udeshi ,  and all other hardworking staff in the kitchen, Hopper making boys ( !! ) all of whom attend ed to all my special dietary needs.

 House keeping staff - Anton and Chrisantha and the rest of the Team - who did an excellent joib on my room .

 I enjoyed the morning bird watching  walks around the garden, meticulously cared for by the special Garden Team-- special mention to Kisantha, Jagath Rajapakse,  Lahiru.
 Same goes for the dedicated Pool Care Staff 

 Security Staff -- also my birdwatcher friend among them - -Mr Sudusinghe, and everyone else who are the Front Line Defenders of the safety of the hotel 

 Sudusinghe, Ravi,  Deepthi, and ALL  the rest of those in the Front Drive in Area-- my special thanks .
 Indeed, they are all my morning and evening parrot show companions !!
 View the photos- -and you will know what I mean .

 The HighLight of my stay -- the  view of  " Sunrise Sripada " from my # 545  , room window  which I will enlarge and hang in my home in Ontario.
 Creator Willing -- I will come again, 2025 !

 Deepthie Rajapakse - -Ontario,. Canada .
 
Till then -  Best Wishes to ALL at Cinnamon Lakeside . 
 Keep  Up the Good Work 
others whose names are too numerous to mention --  I thank you ALL for the special attention, " above and beyond the call of duty " paid to me .  
 
 House Keeping - Mr Anton ,  Chrisantha -- for the utmost care taken to keep my room clean etc, flowers for the room, etc, etc 

Garden Care Staff-  Kisantha  and Jagath Rajapakse, for the many 'guided tours ' of the lovely grounds, as I am a gardener my self, and really  , really love my morning walk in the garden/ pool area, bird watching etc on the Beira Lake  .

 This place is a Bird Watchers Paradise !!
 This potential has to be explored with Bird Watching Tours -- Mr Sudusinghe ( Security Staff ) is an avid birdwatcher, that I came to know some years back, as Security was 'watching me ' as I was roaming around  the property , with my binocs !!
 
 The  photos attached tell My Story-- Sighting of  Sri Pada from my room  #545, and # 441 , has to be The Highlight , this being the very first time I had this  oppertunity  and this photo will be enlarged and hang in my home in Canada as  Spiritual Memory of Sri Lanka...

 To my many friends in ' My Home in Colombo " - -I thank you very much .
 God Willing, I will return 2025, !
God Bless You All.
 Till we Meet Again.
 Deepthie Rajapakse .
title: Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel --" My Home in Colombo " for Many Years ,and more  come, I hope !

roomTip: Fantastic patisserie downstairs. Does amazing chocolate croissants, pair with a lovely breakfast tea. Gorgeous 😍
text: Beautiful hotel. Stunning lobby, made even better with a pianist. Lots of selections for bars/restaurants.  Beautiful view over the lake. Lovely looking pool. Large and clean rooms. Plentiful staff who were very helpful. Buffet was by far best buffet meal I've had; so much selection.  Gorgeous carvery meats. Dessert selection blew my mind; had apple crumble, chocolate triangle, merengue nest, and chocolate pot. Stunning.
title: One night stay, stunning.

text:
We checked in to Cinnamon Lakeside on election day and it proved to be a great idea for a lot of reasons
Upon check in we found that we have received an upgrade on our room from Superior to Premium. Thank you for that 
Room was spacious and all the amenities were of international standards
Breakfast buffet was also top notch and the kids loved the huge collection of cereals and other options they had
title: Perfect Election Night Experience

text:
even though it was only for a night we had a great stay at this hotel.
staff were very helpful and kind.
the room was spacious enough to accommodate the big suitcases.
we made use of one of their bars, The Library, and the cocktails were on point, as well as the service.
we had to leave very early in the morning but they prepared us a breakfast “box” with a lot of things.

text: Typical Taj - just excellent in every way.  Grand entry rooms, towering ceilings and space all around.  Staff are so friendly and helpful - in the typical Sri Lankan style.  Rooms (Club Room status) were very spacious, clean, and had everything needed.  An older styled building set in gardens.  Check out was disappointing as a "friend" of the staff sat at the desk at the same time I was completing my transactions - disappointing - lacked necessary privacy.
title: Just Fantastic - well located in Colombo

roomTip: Opt for rooms closer to the life else you end up walking all the time.
text:
The Lobby was very crowded. Given the huge price we had paid (half boat package) , no welcome drink was offered. Room size was very small for the price offered. The best part was the view from the room. The sunset and beach view was amazing.
Pros: Service is quick and good.
           View from the room is amazing.
            Indian Veg food options are very good.
            Gym was maintained well.

Cons: No Welcome drink offered.
           Room size is small.
            Swimming pool area has pungent drainage smell, I couldn't stay for long in water.
           Very long walk from the lift to the room. 
            Nothing for the kids, more of a business hotel.
         
On my next trip I would prefer something cozy and better for this price. I went by the brand Taj and was disappointed. You end-up spending for the Brand only.
title: Nothing great!

text:
Staff is very well trained and go out of their way to help you, shoutout to captain Morin for her help which went above and beyond what was expected. 

Room was very comfortable and the food was great. Highlight of the food experience was the food at YuMi, the Japanese restobar. Everything we had there was amazing. 

Cons 

- The concierge was not very helpful when asked for suggestions on what we could do around the city. You’d be better off googling 
- For some reason, it was a chore to get our room cleaned. For 2 days in a row we had to call housekeeping more than 5 times just to get them to come to the room
title: Almost a 10/10

text:
Staying at this place has been a nightmare. Guests are smoking in the rooms and hallways. Breakfast extremely busy and didn’t seem to have enough staff.
I was told by someone at the front desk the hotel is full.
I also found the front desk people a bit arrogant. Not helpful at all.
I would not stay at this hotel again. Unfortunately I still have to spend one more night here. Definitely will go out for dinner and not go to their dining room.
title: Disappointed with Taj

placeInfo: {'id': '304700', 'name': 'Taj Samudra, Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 5684, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.922645, 'longitude': 79.846794, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d304700-Reviews-Taj_Samudra_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.tajhotels.com/en-in/taj/taj-samudra-colombo/', 'address': '25 Galle Face Center Road, Colombo 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '25 Galle Face Center Road', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 118, 'count2': 170, 'count3': 390, 'count4': 938, 'count5': 4070}}
text:
I will start by saying that this hotel has all the makings of an excellent hotel with its location and facilities but in reality it is very far off being a five star hotel.

The first issues came prior to arrival. I tried to arrange an early check in on numerous occasions in the weeks before I arrived. However, every time I contacted the Hotel they said that this would not be possible. Check-in time is 3pm and I arrived at 12pm. I was told that my room would be ready in one hour, so in the interim I went and has lunch. When I returned over an hour later I was told that I would need to wait a further 30 minutes for my room.

When I eventually got to my room I was underwhelmed to say the least. I had booked a deluxe ocean facing room. I was given an ocean facing room on the second floor but there was no balcony only a large window. The window was so dirty on the outside that I only got a hazy view of the ocean. The room was small and the fixtures were very tired. The bathroom was of good size but there was lots of mould in the shower and the shower door did not shut meaning the bathroom constantly flooded.

On the evening of the first night I had some laundry done which was promptly picked up and returned the next day. On returning my laundry it was evident that a number of my cotton work polos had been shrunk. The hotel did not do anything about this.

Staff can be very hit and miss, especially the waiting staff. The Doormen at the front of the hotel and those in the lobby area are fantastic and very personable, and the staff working in the gym are very good. However, staff in the various restaurants and bars were generally poor. It took a long time to get water for the table, and was nearly impossible to get any beverages apart from tap water - I asked for a Coca Cola on numerous occasions only to be told this couldn't be provided. Waiting staff at the lattice bar are especially poor at serving and clearing drinks. Housekeeping were good at cleaning the room, however on a number of occasions I was not provided with water or a replenishment of other amenities. 

Food in the hotel is generally of good quality. However, there is a noted lack of variation in the buffet. It is usually the same dishes every night.

I am really not sure how this hotel has so many positive reviews. Having spent the last couple of weeks staying at numerous excellent hotels in India prior to travelling to Sri Lanka I was expecting a similar experience but this was not the case.
title: Not a five star experience!

text:
I am writing to express my utmost satisfaction with my recent stay at Taj Samudra Colombo. From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was greeted with warm hospitality and impeccable service that exceeded my expectations.

The hotel's elegant ambiance and stunning beachfront location provided a truly unforgettable experience. The spacious and well-appointed room was a perfect retreat, offering a comfortable and luxurious setting. The staff, from the front desk to the housekeeping team, were consistently friendly, helpful, and attentive to our needs.

I would like to extend a special commendation to Mr. Malaka, for his exceptional leadership and dedication. His commitment to ensuring guest satisfaction was evident in every aspect of our stay. Additionally, I was particularly impressed by the ground staff, whose professionalism and enthusiasm made our experience even more enjoyable.

Thank you to everyone at Taj Samudra Colombo for providing such an outstanding stay. I will definitely be returning in the future and recommending this hotel to others.
title: An Exceptional Stay at Taj Samudra Colombo

Overall, Taj Samundra is a true gem. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking an unforgettable experience.

placeInfo: {'id': '304700', 'name': 'Taj Samudra, Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 5684, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.922645, 'longitude': 79.846794, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d304700-Reviews-Taj_Samudra_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.tajhotels.com/en-in/taj/taj-samudra-colombo/', 'address': '25 Galle Face Center Road, Colombo 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '25 Galle Face Center Road', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 118, 'count2': 170, 'count3': 390, 'count4': 938, 'count5': 4070}}
text:
The name, the location, the staff, the view, the property, the room, the service, the food, the wines and spirits now has become a beautiful memory for me longing to go back. That’s why they call it #tajness Luxury hospitality with a human touch, I have travelled around the world and stayed at a lot of the world famous brands of luxury resorts, hotels & palaces over and over again. This time my stay at Colombo Sri Lanka was truly unforgettable, specially I wined, dined and stayed at Taj Samudra for 5 nights, my suite #251 it was so cozy and comfortable with an amazing view of the of the Indian Ocean, the food, whether it was the lavish breakfast buffet at PORTS OF CALL, or the business lunch at GOLDEN DRAGON or the mouth water Indian delicacies for dinner at NAVRATNA or sipping some world class wines or single malts at the Taj Club lounge situated on the 6th floor. As a very picky and demanding guest myself, who expects finesse in every detail. As my association with Taj Hotels goes back a very long time ( a few decades ) this stay was very special one, the way they took care of me and my friends was truly amazing, from the time I checked in the GM Samrat, the Hotel Manager Karan, the F&B director Avishek & their entire team who welcomed me like a Maharaja, after a quick photo session, I was taken directly to my suite and the checkin formalities was done there. After having a quiet afternoon catching up with my mails and calls, my friend joined me at the Taj Club lounge where we enjoyed our drinks along with some delicious bites watching the Sunset. The next morning after a quiet and comfortable sleep I hit pool for a quick swim and then after taking a hot steam, I went for breakfast, where I met the amazing Executive Chef Sajesh, a very quiet and shy guy he and his team just mesmerised me with with mouth watering food whether it was the Local Sri Lankan, Indian, Chinese cuisines during my entire stay including the Delicious takeaway of Mutton Biriyani and the Mutton Gulati Kebabs he had made for me a short notice. He always gave me a big surprise with some amazing dishes which my mouth is still watering when I am writing about it. The attention to detail in service whether it was the staff’s of Restaurants, Club lounge, Housekeeping, In room dining, the Lobby bar, Front desk, Concierge,Gym & Swimming pool, the last not the least the Doorman and the Security guards, they all always welcomed me with a warm smile. I interacted a lot with the staffs of various departments during my stay whom a few I remember their names and others I don’t and because of that I am not going to write the names of any staff so that I don’t hurt anyone. The biggest joke I have to say is that some of the staff thought I was some secret audit guy as I was talking to them in the industry language. Once again I Thank each one of you from the bottom of my heart for making me feel so special and making my stay such a memorable one. Namaste 🙏

I am going to mention a few names of the staff who were the part of the team who made my stay a memorable one, also others whom I unfortunately don’t remember their names please forgive me 🙏

Dinusha and Dilshani from the Front Office

Amar, Tusitha, Michael, Morin, Yashodhara, PA from In room dinning

Chathura, Ajith, Hettiarachchi, Pethurm, Sithara, Gauri, Namal from Housekeeping

The staff at the various restaurants and bar, doorman, concierge, security staff, Gym & pool incharge, travel desk and the other who were behind the scene thank you so much 🙏
title: Ayubowan Taj Colombo

placeInfo: {'id': '304700', 'name': 'Taj Samudra, Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 5684, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.922645, 'longitude': 79.846794, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d304700-Reviews-Taj_Samudra_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.tajhotels.com/en-in/taj/taj-samudra-colombo/', 'address': '25 Galle Face Center Road, Colombo 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '25 Galle Face Center Road', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 118, 'count2': 170, 'count3': 390, 'count4': 938, 'count5': 4070}}
text:
Kasun
Malan
Jayasundara 
Gamini

Taj Samudra is a good option for anyone seeking luxury and comfort in Colombo. Located along the beautiful Galle Face, the hotel offers breathtaking ocean views, making it perfect for both business and leisure travelers. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with impeccable hospitality, typical of the Taj brand.

The rooms are spacious, elegantly furnished, and equipped with all modern amenities. I stayed in a sea-facing room, and waking up to the view of the Indian Ocean was an absolute delight. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep, and the bathroom was spotless, with high-quality toiletries.

Dining at the hotel was another highlight. The breakfast buffet at Latitude had a wide range of both local and international dishes, all delicious and freshly prepared. I also dined at Navratna, their Indian restaurant, which served some of the best North Indian cuisine I've had in Colombo.

The hotel’s large outdoor pool, lush gardens, and fitness center provide ample relaxation options. The only minor downside was that the check-in process was a bit slow. However, the overall experience was **good**, and I would gladly stay at Taj Samudra again.
title: Dinner experience

roomTip: Get to know the staff! They are amazing.
text: I felt so cared for at this hotel and recommend it HIGHLY. I stayed here twice during my business trip to Sri Lanka (one night at the beginning and one night at the end). I wish I had been able to stay at this hotel longer. The staff is kind, attentive, and has a great process for welcoming their guests. Special thanks to Dilshani, Suranga, Anushka, Shiraz and the Port's of call Restaurant staff: W.D. Chaminda, Dilhara, Uddika, Maduh, & Nilanka. I will always be grateful for my time with them. Outstanding service, delicious food, gorgeous rooms, beautiful decor. If you are staying in Colombo on your journey in Sri Lanka, this is the place to be!  I feel like I made many friends that I can return to!
title: Wonderful experience at Taj Samudra Colombo

placeInfo: {'id': '304700', 'name': 'Taj Samudra, Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 5684, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.922645, 'longitude': 79.846794, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d304700-Reviews-Taj_Samudra_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.tajhotels.com/en-in/taj/taj-samudra-colombo/', 'address': '25 Galle Face Center Road, Colombo 80000 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '25 Galle Face Center Road', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '80000'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 118, 'count2': 170, 'count3': 390, 'count4': 938, 'count5': 4070}}
roomTip: Don't hesitate.
text:
Over the last 33 years we have stayed in many different hotels, mainly five star, both in Colombo and throughout Sri Lanka.  The Taj Samudra rates very highly in our opinion and it is certainly one to which we would be very happy to return.

The staff have been charming, attentive and helpful, in particular Mr Chaminda Jayalath for his professional attention and in introducing us to several different breakfast alternatives; to the reception staff generally and to the staff of the Golden Dragon where both the service and the food was superb.

The accommodation was excellent and the overall feeling within the building was one of quiet sophistication.  Thank you for a very enjoyable stay.
title: Friendly, attentive staff in very comfortable surroundings

text: This is my third stay at the Colombo Marriott this year, and every visit feels more like returning to family. The staff consistently go above and beyond to make each guest feel valued and respected. Special thanks to Ms. Heshali Barnes and Mr. Hamza Gafoor, who always accommodate my special requests and understand my travel needs perfectly. Their attention to detail and genuine care have made my stays so much more comfortable and stress-free. Honestly, I choose to pay and stay here instead of with family because the atmosphere and hospitality at this hotel truly reduce my stress. The team’s consistency in offering exceptional service to all guests is remarkable, and I’m grateful for their continued warmth and professionalism."

placeInfo: {'id': '23996995', 'name': 'Courtyard By Marriott Colombo', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 534, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.918187, 'longitude': 79.85626, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23996995-Reviews-Courtyard_By_Marriott_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/cmbcy-courtyard-colombo/overview/', 'address': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road Colombo City Centre, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road', 'street2': 'Colombo City Centre', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 8, 'count2': 3, 'count3': 16, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 478}}
text:
I recently stayed at Courtyard by Marriott, Colombo and had an amazing experience! 
Mr Ashen, marketing manager,  ensured the reservation process was incredibly smooth and efficient, setting the tone for a wonderful stay.

From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed with warm hospitality and friendly smiles from the staff. The check-in process was quick and efficient, making me feel right at home.
To mention a few :
Mr.Ashan, Mr.Vinojan, Mr.Voyanga, Ms.Madhavee, Ms,Rukshala, Ms.Maneesha, Mr.Rhoshita, Ms.Heshali Barnes...
They provided me with all the necessary information about the hotel amenities, local attractions, and dining options. Their recommendations were spot on and greatly enhanced my stay!
Throughout my time at the hotel, the front office staff was always ready to assist with any requests, whether it was arranging transportation, providing extra toiletries, or answering my questions about the area. They went above and beyond to ensure that my experience was as pleasant as possible.
Overall, the front office team at Courtyard by Marriott, Colombo exemplifies what exceptional service should be. Their dedication, professionalism, and genuine warmth not only made my stay memorable but also prompted me to recommend this hotel to friends and family. I look forward to my next visit!

The room was spotless and clean, with comfortable furnishings that made my stay incredibly relaxing. 
The amenities provided were a fantastic bonus that enhanced my stay.
The fitness facilities at the hotel were top-notch, with a wide range of equipment and a welcoming atmosphere.
During my recent stay I had the pleasure of working with Mr.Anura Perera, the fitness trainer at the hotel, and it was truly a highlight of my trip!
From our first session, he was incredibly attentive and tailored the workouts to fit my fitness level and goals. He took the time and provided helpful tips on form and technique, ensuring that I got the most out of every exercise while minimising the risk of injury. I particularly appreciated his guidance 
One of the things that stood out to me was Mr.Anura's positive energy and motivation. 

Dining at the restaurant : I cannot say enough good things about the staff! From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted with warm smiles and a welcoming atmosphere that immediately set the tone for a fantastic dining experience.
The staff was not only attentive but also genuinely friendly and knowledgeable. 
To mention a few - 
Ms. Sara***** (5 stars), Ms. Malmmee the hostess carried a lot of charm and dignity in attending the guests. They are an asset to Courtyard by Marriott.
Mr. Indika, Mr. Mallita the restaurant managers ensured that non the of guests were left unattended  and checked in regularly to ensure everything was to my liking, providing perfect service without being intrusive.
Ms. Ama ***** (5 Stars) , Ms. Sewmini, Ms. Mihara, Mr.Ulindu, Mr. Jehan the waiters & waitress who served me, went above and beyond to recommend dishes based on my preferences. Their enthusiasm for the food was infectious and made the menu options even more appealing.
Mr Kalyan Singh, the chef even personally ensured that the tase & presentation meets my expectation.
Mr. Bandula Premarathna, F&B Manager. it was a great pleasure meeting him & experiencing exceptional service. His attention to detail and commitment to ensuring an outstanding dining experience truly elevated my visit.

Overall, my dining experience was exceptional, thanks in large part to the dedicated restaurant staff. Their attention to detail, friendly demeanor, and exceptional service made my meals truly memorable. I highly recommend dining here if you’re staying at the hotel—you won’t be disappointed!

One of the highlights was how Courtyard team has organized a special evening event to kick start Christmas celebrations for 2024, featuring a curated tasting menu with wine pairings. 
This event was flawlessly executed, and the ambiance created was both relaxing and sophisticated. It was a wonderful way to meet other guests and enjoy a unique culinary experience.

The location is perfect, with easy access to popular attractions, public transport, etc., making it convenient for exploring the area. The staff went above and beyond to ensure I had everything I needed and were always available to answer any questions I had.

Overall, I highly recommend Courtyard by Marriott for anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. I can’t wait to return on my next visit!
title: Wonderful stay at Courtyard by Marriott.

text:
The reservation team has made a huge blunder saying that they cannot reserve 10 packs at once. Hence, I had to reserve 6 pax under 1 reservation and balance 4 pax under another reservation. Where all cannot sit in 1 table which was much frustrating. 

But after noticing my dissapintment, chef intervined and arranged us a separate table where all 10 can accommodate !
Once we where settled, Sahiru gave an exceptional service that we had no complaints afterwards.

Booking date 
17.10.2024 8.30pm
title: Reservation team blunder

text:
I recently stayed and attended a few events at this hotel for my friends’ wedding celebrations. The staff were so accommodating, polite, and professional throughout my stay here. I really appreciated how welcoming and at home they made each of us feel from the time we arrived until our departure.
The food (for breakfast and for catering at the events I attended) were delicious as well. 
The rooms at this hotel were always kept clean and comfortable (with amazing views of the city). 
I’d also like to give a huge thank you to the banquet staff (Shanuka, Sochini, Inusha, Janith, Bashith, Damith, and Tharindu) for making my friends’ wedding festivities so special and keeping everything up to par throughout our time!
title: Wonderful Experience

placeInfo: {'id': '23996995', 'name': 'Courtyard By Marriott Colombo', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 534, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.918187, 'longitude': 79.85626, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23996995-Reviews-Courtyard_By_Marriott_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/cmbcy-courtyard-colombo/overview/', 'address': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road Colombo City Centre, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road', 'street2': 'Colombo City Centre', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 8, 'count2': 3, 'count3': 16, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 478}}
text:
The dining experience was truly exceptional, beginning with the food, which was both delicious and well-prepared.

However, what truly stood out was the impeccable service. Our server, Roshane, went above and beyond to ensure our visit was enjoyable. He was attentive, polite, and quick to respond to any requests, making sure we had everything we needed throughout the meal. His professionalism, combined with a warm and friendly attitude, made us feel welcomed and well taken care of. Roshane took the time to explain the menu options, made excellent recommendations, and checked in regularly without being intrusive. 

His genuine commitment to providing great service elevated the entire experience, making it not just a meal, but a memorable occasion. It’s clear that the staff takes pride in creating a positive atmosphere for their guests. We left feeling completely satisfied, and we look forward to returning soon.
title: Good service

text:
For a 4 star establishment this hotel falls short. The first thing you notice is the musty smell in the halls. The room air conditioning isn’t quite up to scratch so the room is a bit stuffy. The lighting in the bathroom doesn’t work for applying or checking make up. 

The bed is very comfortable. The tv service is very good. There’s a wide range of options for breakfast and the location is pretty convenient.

The staff are very pleasant and helpful.
title: Not quite up to 4 star standard

ownerResponse: {'id': '973279598', 'text': "Thank you, Lakshan, for your detailed feedback. We’re sorry to hear that our dinner buffet did not meet your expectations, and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. The limited selection of Sri Lankan dishes during your visit was due to our ongoing Pakistani Food Festival, where we aimed to showcase Pakistani cuisine. While we continued to offer a range of international dishes, the festival's focus was on providing our guests with a culinary experience featuring the flavors of Pakistan.\n\nWe regret that this impacted your experience and hope you’ll consider joining us again once our regular menu is back, so we can offer you a more balanced variety of dishes, including our Sri Lankan favorites.", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-10-09', 'responder': 'Courtyard Colombo', 'connectionToSubject': 'Marketing'}
placeInfo: {'id': '23996995', 'name': 'Courtyard By Marriott Colombo', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 534, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.918187, 'longitude': 79.85626, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23996995-Reviews-Courtyard_By_Marriott_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/cmbcy-courtyard-colombo/overview/', 'address': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road Colombo City Centre, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road', 'street2': 'Colombo City Centre', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 8, 'count2': 3, 'count3': 16, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 478}}
text:
This was the worst Dinner Buffet I ever had. There were no foods variations. And also no live action in the buffet. Not worth for Rs.7100.
This buffet had only Chicken Biriyani, Chicken Fried Rice, Kotthu, Noodles & Roast Paan for main meal. No Hoppers, Pasta, Pizza, Parata, Egg Rotti.
And also no Sri Lankan Rice & Curry Corner. No Indian Menu, No Western Menu. No vegetarian Menu. And also this Dinner Buffet had less than 10 Desserts Items.
I wonder how this Hotel got 4 Star Category by serving this kind of poor Dinner Buffet. This was the poorest Dinner I experienced ever.
title: Terrible Dinner

text: I recently made a reservation for an anniversary celebration, and the entire experience exceeded our expectations. My wife and I went for the dinner buffet, and there were so many delicious options to choose from. It was well worth the price. The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, especially our server, Shiva, who made sure we had everything we needed. Mr. Chathura was also very attentive and ensured our evening went smoothly. To top it off, they surprised us with a cake to celebrate the occasion. I highly recommend this place and will definitely be returning!
title: Dinner buffet at Beira Kitchen

text:
Courtyard by Marriot Colombo always has a special place in my heart. The beautiful views of the sea, stunning sunset, Beira lake and Gangarama temple are some of the best things about this location. Food and cocktails were wonderful and always exceeded our expectations.
The lovely staff and their service is exceptional. We always felt pampered and spoiled every single time we visited. Chathura and Jehan were super helpful and provided excellent service, while all other staff members were extremely friendly, professional and pleasant. Courtyard by the pool is the best place to sit, relax and sip a delicious cocktail and enjoy the view.
title: Excellent, Great Food, Great staff, Best view and Best ever cocktails

ownerResponse:
{'id': '970937724', 'text': "Dear Mildred,

Thank you for taking the time to share such a detailed review of your experience at Courtyard by Marriott Colombo. We’re delighted that you enjoyed our thoughtfully designed rooms and found the layout and facilities convenient and comfortable during your stay. It's wonderful to hear that our team’s service left such a positive impression – your kind words about our knowledgeable and friendly staff are much appreciated.

We’re thrilled that you had a great time at our Beira Kitchen Bar at Level 9, and I will be sure to pass along your compliments to Udayanga and Washindu for their exceptional cocktail-making skills. The Arrack Treacle and Ceylon Mule are indeed two of our signature drinks, and it's fantastic that you enjoyed learning about Arrack from our talented bartenders.

We’re also pleased you made the most of our infinity pool and gym facilities, and that you caught a glimpse of the stunning Colombo sunset from our rooftop.

Thank you once again for your thoughtful feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back to our stylish, hip hotel in the heart of Colombo for another memorable stay.", 'lang': 'en', 'publishedDate': '2024-09-22', 'responder': 'Courtyard Colombo', 'connectionToSubject': 'Marketing'}
placeInfo: {'id': '23996995', 'name': 'Courtyard By Marriott Colombo', 'rating': 5, 'numberOfReviews': 534, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.918187, 'longitude': 79.85626, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23996995-Reviews-Courtyard_By_Marriott_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/cmbcy-courtyard-colombo/overview/', 'address': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road Colombo City Centre, Colombo 00200 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': 'Colombo City Centre, 137 Muttiah Road', 'street2': 'Colombo City Centre', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00200'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 8, 'count2': 3, 'count3': 16, 'count4': 30, 'count5': 478}}
text:
The rooms normal sized but look spacious because of the furnishings and layout- very well designed facilities in the room, electrical sockets are placed at convenient places, everything works. Stylish, hip hotel with excellent staff who are knowledgeable, helpful and friendly.

Gym is well equipped, infinity pool is a decent size for laps, has a good view of the sunset.

The highlight for me at the hotel was the bar at level 9! Excellent cocktails made by bartenders Udayanga and Washindu - I recommend the Arrack Treacle and Ceylon Mule. These two guys are great at their jobs, they took time to answer my questions about Arrack and made me amazing drinks!
title: Best Cocktails in Town, Stylish great hotel

text:
The hotel’s rooftop pool offers beautiful ocean views, and there’s a fitness center and spa for relaxation. The main restaurant serves both local and international dishes, with fresh seafood being a highlight. 

Guests often appreciate the friendly and helpful staff, who are quick to assist with any needs. With easy access to Colombo's top sights, shops, and nightlife, Mirage Hotel is ideal for a pleasant stay by the sea.
title: The review of mirage hotel after staying with friends

text:
First experience of the hotel was as a venue for my brother’s wedding, we’ve come from the UK and was present for  traditional Hindu wedding which was fantastic where the food was amazing.

We later stayed at the hotel for a few days, the staff were very helpful and the experience was great. The rooms were very clean and cleaned throughout our stay, given bottles of water every day and the menu in the restaurant allowed us to experience various dishes.

The location is right on the beach and a fantastic view of the Indian Ocean.

Recommend
title: Great stay & venue for Hindu wedding

placeInfo: {'id': '2038179', 'name': 'Galle Face Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 3689, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.920018, 'longitude': 79.84597, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d2038179-Reviews-Galle_Face_Hotel-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.gallefacehotel.com/', 'address': '3,2 Galle Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3,2 Galle Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 88, 'count2': 105, 'count3': 221, 'count4': 825, 'count5': 2451}}
text:
Beautiful historic property, one of the ‘best East of Suez’ hotels from the late 1800s. Fantastic location on Galle Face Green. Rooms refurbished in 2019. Heritage wing rooms recommended over Annex - ocean facing King Deluxe and jr suites very nice. Breakfast buffet had a superb spread and is served outside at Verandah looking out over the ocean. Evening drinks in Travellers Bar excellent - inside and outside. Service very friendly - both in F&B as well as front office staff.

In terms of improvement areas, despite renovation 5 years ago, the tropical climate ages properties rapidly. It’s in constant need of keep-up - and not as well maintained as other old Grand Dames such as the Raffles in Singapore, the Mandarin Oriental in Bangkok or the E&O in Penang. But of course the price points are quite different as well. All in all good value for money.
title: Grand old dame of Colombo - great place to stay

text: If possible, this hotel should be included in any itinerary for a visit to Colombo, either for a drink, a meal or ideally a stay incorporating the full experience. The historical features and ambience are beautifully maintained, supported by fantastic service, outstanding food, and a superb setting, particularly for a drink at sunset looking out over the Indian Ocean. Marvellous.
title: Wonderful history-filled hotel with fantastic ambience, staff, food and service.

text: Excellent service and food at In on the Green at Galle Face Hotel. Dananjana, Tuan, Nimesh and Kelun who attended to us was very polite and was always at it whenever we needed any food or beverage. His welcomed us as we walked in and was very pleasant. The band that played was Overdoxe and they really hit it in the entertainment factor. Cheerful set of guys who add value to the atmosphere at In on the Green and the crew won our hearts to come back once again. A special mention to Dananjana because of his customer service skills, personality and F&B knowledge.
title: A heartfelt evening at the heart of Colombo

text:
Me and my Wife are deeply grateful for the exceptional service and hospitality we received during our daughter's wedding at the hotel.
 
From the moment we began planning, Ms Onela (assistant manager events) and Mr Siddique (Asst. Front office Manager) and their team were incredibly supportive and accommodating. The entire staff went above and beyond to ensure that every detail was perfect, and their dedication truly made the event unforgettable.
 
I would like to extend a special thank you to Mr. Siddique.  His assistance was invaluable, from helping us coordinate hall arrangements, room bookings for our guests, last minutes requests and addressing various other matters with efficiency and grace. His professionalism and willingness to go the extra mile did not go unnoticed and made the entire experience seamless and enjoyable for everyone involved. A special thanks to Mr. Sampath & Mr. Naleen and their team as well, who were very supportive in ensuring the table and overall hall arrangements and food & coffee & sweet arrangements on the wedding day night went smoothly.
 
We would like to convey our sincere appreciation to all the staff members who contributed to the success of our daughter's wedding. We received numerous compliments from our guests about the beautiful venue & the ambience of the hall, delicious food, and the warm and attentive service.
 
We will cherish the memories of this special occasion forever and will highly recommend your hotel to our friends and family.
title: We had our daughter’s wedding at Galleface hotel for above 400 guests in Aug 2024.

text:
This is my second visit to Colombo but my first stay at the Galle Face Hotel.I am extremely happy to have chosen a heritage hotel ( dating 1864) that lives up to my expectations.Modern hotels can be found around the world and are deprived of such charm and authenticity.Here, you will find beautiful architecture, furniture and  persian carpets giving you the feeling of reliving one of Agatha Christie’s books , not to mention exceptional great service .
Our room was overlooking the ocean .To me, nothing beats sleeping with the sound of the waves .
A special mention to housekeeping by Fernando . His daily small attentions made our stay memorable: fresh cut lilies , presentations of towels , finding clothes neatly folded on my bed etc …We will definitely come back to this one of a kind hotel !
title: One of a kind !

text:
A classic hotel staff are fantastic helpful with local knowledge and top tips on having a great and safe stay
From arrival to check out you are treated as a special guest check in very quick and bags at our room on arrival they were able to offer us early check in which after a long flight was a god send
Room service was good prompt and food was hot ,room itself large with all u would expect form a 5* hotel 
Breakfast excellent a little to easy to overeat as three was so much choice The hotel has a feel of a bygone age quality and grandeur 
Outside  bar a nice place to watch the sunset 
Pool area needs attention and let’s the place down broken and cracked decking a major hazard and needs urgent care 

Looking for somewhere a bit different this is the place for you
title: Old style luxury

text:
It was a lifelong dream of mine to stay at the Galle Face Hotel because my grandfather always stayed there, when he visited Colombo. I have come to Colombo several times but the closest I ever got was staring wistfully at the building from the Taj Samudra where I was staying.

This time I did and I'm never staying anywhere else in Colombo again.

We loved it!

A very special thanks to Mr. Siddiq at the front office who is the quintessential hotelier and was so good to us and to the chef at the KOTM restaurant who made us an outstanding meal. Both the grilled vegetable paella and the sticky pork ribs were exceptional.

All the staff were so welcoming and we loved our room. I think that 2007 is going to be my permanent room request for every trip to Colombo I make for the rest of my life. 

Thank you!!
title: A lifelong dream comes True!

placeInfo: {'id': '2038179', 'name': 'Galle Face Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 3689, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.920018, 'longitude': 79.84597, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d2038179-Reviews-Galle_Face_Hotel-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.gallefacehotel.com/', 'address': '3,2 Galle Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '3,2 Galle Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 88, 'count2': 105, 'count3': 221, 'count4': 825, 'count5': 2451}}
text:
My wife and I stayed in this hotel for 3 nights in October 2024.

1.	Good Points
a.	This hotel is isolated, well within the city. 5-10Min walk to shopping malls, the sea, and many restaurants and shopping malls.
b.	The room and toilet were clean.
c.	The staffs were friendly and very accommodating to our requests.
d.	The hotel has few bars beside the sea. The cocktails served was good. This was my personal favorite.
e.	The buffet breakfast had decent amount of food variety, mostly Indian food of course, and it was all tasty.
f.	The pillow and bed was just OK, not the greatest, but will do.
g.	The check-in and check-out process was fast.
h.	All the staffs spoke decent to good, English.

2.	Bad Points
a.	I paid USD350 Per Night (including taxes) for the Heritage Seaview room. The amenities in the room were somewhat limited.
b.	The hotel does have a swimming pool but nothing much to shout about.
c.	The rooms are somewhat old but will do.
d.	The sea smells bad. When you open your room balcony, it has some kinda smell from the sea.

3.	Will I return again to this hotel?
No. I will try Cinnamon Grand, which is down the main road
title: Nice Hotel but Can Be Better

roomTip: A very comfortable and chilled magnificent colonial hotel, dont bother looking for anywhere else to eat, the buffet restaurant is excellent.
text: This hotel is a magnificent old colonial style hotel and just exudes style and comfort in a calming and relaxed atmosphere. It's location on the green and sea shore is perfect and having breakfast or other meals on the terrace looking out to sea is just fantastic. The traditional wedding, dancing and music that took place on the lawn by the terrace on our first morning  was a joy that my wife and me will remember forever. Thanks to all staff for an enjoyable stay at the start and end of our Sri Lankan tour.
title: Must stay location in Colombo.

placeInfo: {'id': '597086', 'name': 'Cinnamon Grand Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 15060, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.917788, 'longitude': 79.84848, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d597086-Reviews-Cinnamon_Grand_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.cinnamonhotels.com/en/cinnamongrandcolombo/', 'address': '77 Galle Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '77 Galle Road', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 157, 'count2': 167, 'count3': 418, 'count4': 1866, 'count5': 12452}}
text:
We dined at Nuga Gama dinner buffet to celebrate my sister's birthday and it proved to be a super choice.
There was a good choice of food including some dishes I hadn't tasted in years. The Jack seed kalu pol, Thibbatu, Mutton curry and soup was delicious as was the rest of the dishes on the menu.
The hoppers tasted so good, one could eat them on their own.
Service by all staff  was excellent. We were served mainly by, Sannasgala and Tharusha who were delightful. They were friendly, efficient and courteous. Always nearby if needed. The used crockery and cutlery were removed promptly. 
Only point I like to make for the attention of management is that it was raining heavily when we arrived and the walk to the Nuga Gama restaurant was
not pleasant due to wet ground, even though we were given umbrellas.
Secondly, the floor around the food station was wet which we had to be careful of especially due to some people standing with their food and chatting by the food stations, further restricting walking g on the dry area while it was raining.
However I and my party decided to give 5 stars mainly for the food, and the service in the buffet area.
Will definitely be reccomending Nuga Gama to friends and family.
title: Thoroughly enjoyable evening.

roomTip: Be prepared to experience untrained and rude staff
text: The hotel was completely impersonal in their attitude. The front desk botched up the check in process and it was not pleasant at all. After signing the cheque for the dinner, the manager came running behind us till the reception area as the front desk staff had not swiped our credit card at the time of check in. It was embarrassing and a completely unexpected experience at a so called five star property. The one night stay was not something that we will be repeating any time soon
title: Bad experience

text:
We stayed at the Cinnamon Grand for our Sri Lankan Homecoming and it was an amazing 5-star experience! We stayed here for 3 nights and each day was better than the last. 

From the mutton rolls & iced coffee in the lobby to the grand buffet in the morning — everything was delicious. 

Thank you to Vinod & Damith for making our breakfast every morning so special. Their customer service was top notch and it made my wife feel very welcomed. Thanks also to Rimshad, Samantha, and Jeremy from the front desk for always being available and helpful if we needed anything!
title: Five Star Experience & Staff

text: I think the price doesn’t correspond with the quality / value. This is not 5 star. The staff is very friendly, great, however the hotelowners should do more maintenance; I got a really bad cough because of the bad ventilation in the room. It smellls like mold/too humid. The windows can’t open. The building is from the ‘50s so not much they can do. Then I booked in USD, they block local currency and then you end up paying more because of an unfavorable exchange rate. Then they also charge ridculous rates for tours, usd300 to Galle(?!). Long story short: The owners should pay the staff more and do maintenance. Until then lower the prices.
title: Not 5 star

placeInfo: {'id': '3801214', 'name': 'The Kingsbury Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 5505, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.932856, 'longitude': 79.84194, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d3801214-Reviews-The_Kingsbury_Hotel-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thekingsburyhotel.com', 'address': '48 Janadhipathi Mawatha, Colombo 00100 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '48 Janadhipathi Mawatha', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00100'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 184, 'count2': 155, 'count3': 326, 'count4': 1008, 'count5': 3837}}
text:
We immensely enjoyed our stay at Kingsbury Hotel which lived up to its expectation as a luxury hotel in the heart of Colombo. 

The entire process was made so much easier by Kaushan who assisted us with our booking.  During our stay Kaushan also made sure that everything was ok and a big thank you Kaushan for making our stay enjoyable.

Kingsbury is a well maintained and clean hotel with very attentive staff who are always there for you, whch makes a  big difference. Thank you to everyone at Kingsbury including Mohamed and his staff in the Executive lounge where we spent time in the evenings to unwind.

The breakfast buffet is simply one of the best we have ever seen albeit I wish there could have been a bit more selection of tropical fruits which I believe may have been due to seasonality.

The location itself is unbeatable, walking distance to the heart of the city, Gall Face Green, Port city etc etc  

.

We look forward to our return trip and will definitely be staying at The Kingsbury Hotel.
title: Luxury hotel in the heart of the city

placeInfo: {'id': '3801214', 'name': 'The Kingsbury Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 5505, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.932856, 'longitude': 79.84194, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d3801214-Reviews-The_Kingsbury_Hotel-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thekingsburyhotel.com', 'address': '48 Janadhipathi Mawatha, Colombo 00100 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '48 Janadhipathi Mawatha', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00100'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 184, 'count2': 155, 'count3': 326, 'count4': 1008, 'count5': 3837}}
text:
We arrived at the hotel lobby to a scene of chaos. Hordes of people, some trying to check-in, others guests from various functions and staff completely out of their depth. Felt like a railway station. We were a group of 6 and our passports were taken. We then just waited for over 20 minutes with no one telling us what was going on. Finally, when we complained, there was some excuse given about rooms. The chaos in the reception area continued all day and we were told there were 3 weddings and a corporate event being held, all at the same time! It did get better the next day. 

Our “pool view” room actually overlooked a car park, but if we squeezed into a corner near the window we could catch a glimpse of the pool! Our room had a cupboard door saying mini bar but there wasn’t even a fridge behind it. There appeared to have been a shortage of hand towels as all our group only received one between two people.

On the plus side, the breakfast was excellent. The room service staff were pleasant as were those at the reception desk. We had an early start and were provided with a good packed breakfast .

This a 5 star hotel and should ensure a calm atmosphere when guests are checking in or using the lobby area. There should be a separate entrance for private function attendees.
title: Would benefit from some improvements

text:
We had the Sunday Carvery Brunch at The Steak Bar today and it was absolutely fantastic! The food selection was fabulous as always with a wide selection of cheeses and cold cuts, crispy skin salmon, chicken, turkey, duck, beef, lamb, prawns, oysters, mussels and lobsters being some of the highlights. 

However what made today's experience amazing was the service - I mentioned to the chef how we enjoyed the rack of lamb last time we were there and was disappointed that it was not on the buffet today...without me asking and within minutes the chef sent a platter of rack of lamb to our table and it was flawlessly cooked!

The serving staff were awesome as well - I forgot to get a spoon and they noticed and before I could get up to get one it was brought over to our table. They also suggested and made a special desert for us - the ice cream kotthu... really yummy. It was a 10/10 experience and the best carvery brunch in Colombo! We'll be back again real soon.
title: Sunday Carvery Brunch at The Steak Bar

placeInfo: {'id': '3801214', 'name': 'The Kingsbury Hotel', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 5505, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.932856, 'longitude': 79.84194, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d3801214-Reviews-The_Kingsbury_Hotel-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.thekingsburyhotel.com', 'address': '48 Janadhipathi Mawatha, Colombo 00100 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '48 Janadhipathi Mawatha', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00100'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 184, 'count2': 155, 'count3': 326, 'count4': 1008, 'count5': 3837}}
roomTip: Do not stay in this hotel
text:
The Kingsbury Hotel official website directed my bookings to a 3rd party booking. I found out upon checking out because the hotel was unable to provide me with an invoice. During booking, it was impossible to know. In other words there is serious security breached. If I wanted to book through a 3 party booking site, I would have done so through Booking.com or other 3rd party website. Hotel staffs were unhelpful. All said was I booked through a 3rd party. When I went through the steps  with the front desk staffs on how booking was done at The Kingsbury Hotel website, the front desk kept quiet. Now I am left with out an invoice to make any official business claims.
To make matter worst, the language and tone of the staffs at the front office was in the direction of it's was your own doing and your own fault
One of the staff even had the cheek to say I should be happy I had a good room to stay in. I rebuked him and told him it was a basic requirement of the hotel to provide good room.
This hotel may look very grand on the exterior, the room inside was old and dated. Carpet was dirty, it had lots of stains. One can tell the carpet had not been changed since it was taken over by local owner.
Food wise wasn't fantastic. Steak was over done when i requested for medium. Salmon fish was overcooked and oily at the Japan restaurant located at the highest level.
I do not recommend anyone stay in this hotel. Not value for money. Service was bad and most importantly, there is a breach in their website. PLEASE BE CAREFUL.
title: Dangerous official hotel website.

roomTip: Dont order service in room. Its super slow
text:
Been coming back to this hotel for 4 years now. Its a nice property. Breakfast has good spread but there seem to be some sort of miscommunication  everytime an order is placed via room these days. If you need service in room it's  super slow and  too many confusions. Houskeeping operator of evening hour is very rude  for some reason.  I tried Ordering some bottle of water to the Front office operator, houskeeping and in room  dining  thrice but they just wouldnt give me water even when I tried odering for  paid bottles. Spa is mediocre. Rooms need deep cleaning.Also, the rooms had human hairs lying around wash basin / shower cubicle. Houskeeping  ringing bell from 7 am for making room was also kind of inappropriate.  Tv internet is super slow.
Ocean  restaurant has good food in  budget. 
Cakes are amazing from the cake shop. Dont shop at zams jewellery  downstairs. Its a total rip off. Pool is amazing
title: Good property, need some fixing

roomTip: Dont miss to have the pizzas in honey beach club [pool bar]
text:
Indulgence Family Meals is the best option for me to treat my loved ones, parents & friends, since Im working overseas "Kingsbury Indulgence" is really helpful.  We can place the order online and pay online, the Kingsbury team does the job perfectly.  The packing of the food, delivering on time everything is perfect.  The best part is we can assort a cake & family meals together so everything will be delivered by one party perfectly which is so convenient.  If talk about the food, the portions are adequate and taste is priceless.  Each dish is well packed hygenically and delivered warm and fresh.  Thanks Kingsbury we love your courteous service & yummy foods.

As a suggestion, please add salads & soups if possible to the family meals.  Also if possible a Japanese, Arabic meals too.
title: Indulgence Family Meals are super worth & yummy !

ownerResponse:
{'id': '978075795', 'text': 'Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciated the comfortable beds, spacious bathroom, clean facilities, and our breakfast offerings.

Your kind words about our team’s service mean a lot to us. Our staff takes great pride in ensuring that every guest feels welcome and well cared for, and it’s wonderful to know that their dedication contributed to making your stay enjoyable.

placeInfo: {'id': '2467186', 'name': 'Colombo Court Hotel & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1326, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.897766, 'longitude': 79.85645, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d2467186-Reviews-Colombo_Court_Hotel_Spa-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.colombocourthotel.com', 'address': '32 Alfred House Ave, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '32 Alfred House Ave', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 28, 'count2': 31, 'count3': 90, 'count4': 348, 'count5': 831}}
roomTip: Not as you seen in pictures
text:
DO NOT BOOK this hotel if you’re planning to at least till next month. There’s an ongoing construction going on in this property whole day, starting from 8AM all you hear is a loud drilling noise. I was extremely frustrated the fact that i couldn’t rest during the day at all. This was a huge disappointed from a hotel like this. You can call and check with the property directly and ask before making the booking to avoid this situation. 

Rooftop bar is closed for renovations( one of the reasons for me to pick this hotel was also their rooftop bar ☹️) 
Rooms are clean but dark, i was not a fan of the lighting .But may be for some people it will work. For me you cant figure out something is white or yellow. 
No mirror in the room. You have to go to washroom all the time to use the mirror which i found very very annoying and the mirror also a half torso so you cannot see your full outfit. For me this is s big NO. 
There was no ventilation system in the washroom. Wasroom door was quite annoying because of the way it closes with a noise. 
SriLankan breakfast was soo average and tasteless. And it costs about LKR2400 +. They have only alar carte menu for breakfast and no buffet. 

Staff was very nice,friendly and very supportive. Very convenient location.
title: Average

placeInfo: {'id': '2467186', 'name': 'Colombo Court Hotel & Spa', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 1326, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.897766, 'longitude': 79.85645, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d2467186-Reviews-Colombo_Court_Hotel_Spa-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://www.colombocourthotel.com', 'address': '32 Alfred House Ave, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '32 Alfred House Ave', 'street2': '', 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 28, 'count2': 31, 'count3': 90, 'count4': 348, 'count5': 831}}
text:
I booked a tour package through my travel agency and trusted them with picking the hotels for my trip, and wow—what a lovely surprise this place turned out to be! 🌟

It checked all my boxes: great wifi (yep, I even streamed Netflix with no issues), super clean, a spacious room with AC and hot showers that worked perfectly. Even though it’s located within the city, the moment you step inside, it’s like a peaceful retreat—no traffic noise at all!

The staff? Incredible. They were so nice and attentive the entire time, making the stay even more enjoyable. And the food was good! Don’t expect 5-star gourmet meals, but for the price, it was definitely great value. I even treated myself to a cocktail 🍹.

The best part? The pool! I wasn’t expecting it, but I ended up having both dinner and breakfast by the pool, and it was such a pleasant experience.

My only tiny suggestion is maybe adding one more lightbulb in the bathroom. But really, everything else was perfect. I’m giving it a 4.9/5!
title: A pleasant surprise with great value and service

text:
This is a great boutique hotel with a fabulous masseuse. I have been gee before - staff very helpful. 
It had renovations going on but it didn’t disturb enjoyment of being there for 2 nights. However for one night (our first) hotel guests were not able to access dinner and pool area outside due to a private party - which is unacceptable. 

Generally the place is well kept and clean - but the blinds in our room could do with a serious clean. 

Hotel needs to decide if it is a club or a hotel
title: Hotel or club?

roomTip: Make use of the pool in the early evening. The breakfast is very good.
text: We spent the first four nights of our month long trip to Sri Lanka at the Colombo Court Hotel. Our rooms were spacious and the beds very comfortable each fitted out with with some very stylish furniture and fittings. We used the pool to cool off in the late afternoon. The Cloud cafe was closed for renovations during our visit so we used the Loft Lounge Bar in the evenings and enjoyed the substantial breakfasts at the poolside in the morning before heading out on our visits. The hotel has a very accessible location whilst remaining  a peaceful sanctuary set within the heart of the city. The eco friendly approach adopted by the hotel team is to be admired. Thank you for a lovely stay.
title: From Bristol to Colombo - four days at the Colombo Court in August 2024

text: This hotel was a great find, situated in the heart of colombo and close to the coastal road. roomTip: A quick ride to the centre, but plenty of shopping and places to eat nearby. Barefoot shop and cafe 2 mins away.
text: What a fab boutique hotel. I'd stayed for a week at another more expensive hotel in colombo and it didnt match this one. Outstanding breakfast with no buffet fight. Huge room and lovely attentive staff. A huge thanks to Sanjith on reception who when i lost my phone in a tuktuk went out of his way to find the driver and my phone was returned. What a real star and asset to the hotel. I'll be staying here again when next in colombo.
title: Quiet oasis

text: I have stayed at the Colombo Court many times over the years and it never disappoints! The environment is lovely - a real little haven in a super convenient part of town. The food and drinks are excellent and the staff wonderful. To name just a few of the new staff - Richly, Hanfal, Dulara, Sanjith. And Mohammed who has always been here to welcome us with a smile. The pool is clean and the perfect temperature and you are walking distance e from a number of nice spots including Barefoot and the Gallery Cafe. The rooms are tasteful and comfortable. This will always be my go to hotel in Colombo!
title: Perfect haven in heart of Colombo - perfect blend of Sri Lankan style with modern comfort.
