text: After a month long stay in the hotel there I have to say a massive thank you for their hospitality. The front of house staff could not go more above and beyond for you. No request was too much. Really caring team members. The housekeeping team was lovely and really looked after me and my party. The rooftop is lush for looking at the stars at night and the library is perfect for any work or calls you may have to take. I've had a wonderful stay. I have to mention how amazing and hard working the restaurant staff were and everyone else who made us feel very comfortable. If I was to name every single person who made this stay special I would make this the longest review. There was not a single person at the hotel who I couldn't thank enough. Thank you for an amazing month in Sri Lanka and your amazing hospitality.
title: Perfect spot for exploring Colombo and  wider Sri Lanka

placeInfo: {'id': '23958991', 'name': 'Granbell Hotel Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 897, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.910313, 'longitude': 79.84873, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23958991-Reviews-Granbell_Hotel_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://granbellhotel.lk/', 'address': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 44, 'count2': 22, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 87, 'count5': 722}}
text:
Great modern clean new hotel, that's also reasonably priced. We booked this hotel for quite a low rate so weren't sure what to expect, however we were really pleasantly surprised. The rooms were very modern and clean. We loved the rooftop bar which always had a great atmosphere and great cocktails. Pool always seemed busy but we weren't that bothered about going in. Japanese restaurant was also excellent with excellent service. Reception area on floor 1 is also nice. Views from the room were also amazing. 
Only point to mention is that the first room they showed us to had a few ants in so we asked to move - they immediately allocated us a different room of the same category and made this very easy, so we can't complain about the service at all there.
title: Great, modern, clean and new

placeInfo: {'id': '23958991', 'name': 'Granbell Hotel Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 897, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.910313, 'longitude': 79.84873, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23958991-Reviews-Granbell_Hotel_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://granbellhotel.lk/', 'address': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 44, 'count2': 22, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 87, 'count5': 722}}
roomTip: Take a ride in the Tuk Tuks, but always negotiate the price.
text:
Everything was perfect. 
A modern hotel with all the latest comfort features. The rooms are stunning, with open-view bathtub and shower, and two restaurants, both with panoramic views and a flawless atmosphere.
The spa and gym are fully equipped. 
And to top it all off, there’s the highlight: a rooftop bar and infinity pool, one of the best I’ve ever seen.
The breakfast is excellent too, definitely worth it!

Special thanks to Rukshan, who went above and beyond to help me, even offering great tips on local spots.
II’ll definitely be back, it’s worth stopping in Colombo just for this.
title: Everything was perfect, like a dream.

text: I highly recommend this charming hotel in Colombo! We loved our stay, especially the dinner buffet, which offered a wonderful variety of vegetables and proteins with many mild options. The rooms were spacious and comfortable, with an excellent shower. The stunning pool and great bar added to the enjoyable atmosphere. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making our experience even better (especially Eranda). Everything is beautifully maintained and aesthetically pleasing. Overall, it was an excellent experience, and we can’t wait to return!
title: Best hotel in colombo

placeInfo: {'id': '23958991', 'name': 'Granbell Hotel Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 897, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.910313, 'longitude': 79.84873, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23958991-Reviews-Granbell_Hotel_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://granbellhotel.lk/', 'address': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 44, 'count2': 22, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 87, 'count5': 722}}
text:
I booked into this hotel for a couple nights / 17-18 October in room 2214 - and left by mistake a bag containing about 20 undershirts which I’d packed for a 2 week trip through Sri Lanka. 

I am after checking all my packing absolutely 100% sure the “packing cube” I was using (from Amazon a sort of zipper bag) slipped between the bedsheets in the room. Anyways. 

As I’m away in the jungle here I had first a friend staying in the same hotel check to find it, and then a friend living in Colombo also checking.  

Multiple phone calls daily and multiple different players on the phone. Needless to say no luck in finding this piece of luggage and honestly it makes me question the integrity of housekeeping or honesty of hotel as - even though it represents “only” a bunch if undershirts it probably means a lot for whoever found them.  

Anyways. Needless to say I’d avoid this hotel unless you do a super good check you didn’t leave anything behind and I of course will remove this negative flagging should the hotel own up and return what should have obviously been found - I’m still in the country this week. 

Sri Lanka is a wonderful wonderful place but I was really disappointed with the lack of after service with Granbell.  Totally disappointed like they didn’t care or take time to investigate.
title: Very bad after-service

Overall the place is very cozy, but unfortunately too busy, we requested a late check out and it was not possible due to 100% occupancy. text:
Granbell have nice comfortable clean rooms with brilliant sea veiw .it is japanese tradition hotel located in colombo.it given enjoyble vacation for me with good memory.

But , sorry to say that this hotel had the worst pizza I have ever eaten.Tomato paste on pizza was too salted and no any spicy taste on their. also that tomato paste was too watery. The cheese on top is a overcooked and hard to eat also.                                                                                               however granbell staff is really kind/Freindly / and their service is awesome ..
title: Wrost pizza ever I tasted. But Excellent customer service.

text:
This is a very beautiful hotel with a good view of the sea.A paradise-like hotel located near the Kollupitiya railway. 
Their services are excellent.But I am not satisfied with the room facilities.The room was not worth the money I paid.There was no water or towel in the room.I called room service many times to get them and no one answered the phone call..
I am not happy with the food also.The french fries were very cold and soggy when they arrive to room.
Must talk about dinner..There was only a limited amount of food available. I think the salad counter needs improve .
The dessert was also the same. There were different colors. The colors were too much. The artificiality of the food was very visible. It was too sweet and it would be better if the dessert was made suitable for a person with diabetes.I doubt if I got enough food for the money spent. 
But the staff of the restaurant is very good. I would like to express my thanks to all of them....❤️
title: There should be some improvement with changes.

placeInfo: {'id': '23958991', 'name': 'Granbell Hotel Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 897, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.910313, 'longitude': 79.84873, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23958991-Reviews-Granbell_Hotel_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://granbellhotel.lk/', 'address': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 44, 'count2': 22, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 87, 'count5': 722}}
text:
The sea view rooms are amazing with a great view. Only thing that could have topped it would have been to have a balcony. The room decoration was great and it was great with the see through bathroom wall and huge bath as well as a shower. 

The cleaner didn't come for a couple of days and we had to ask for fresh towels and for the bin to be emptied. Once we asked them they rectified it. 

The rooftop bar was great with amazing views over the city and coast. Also the infinity pool and jacuzzi was amazing. These  things really made our stay special and a great sunset could be seen on most days.

The bar staff were friendly and even brought me a cake with my name on for my birthday which was a lovely touch. Mihiranga and Tharushi were great. 

We went to the spa for a massage one day and they fit us in quickly and the massage was great. It was made even better by the sea views.
title: Great Seaview Rooms, Rooftop Bar and Rooftop Pool

placeInfo: {'id': '23958991', 'name': 'Granbell Hotel Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 897, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.910313, 'longitude': 79.84873, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23958991-Reviews-Granbell_Hotel_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://granbellhotel.lk/', 'address': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 44, 'count2': 22, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 87, 'count5': 722}}
roomTip: Not recommend the high tea buffet for the guests who will hope to come on future.
text:
I have a very unpleasant experience with high tea buffet.
I have attended Granbell high tea on several times and never experienced anything such this.

The sandwich fillings were spoiled and there was some bad smell also.

Had to wait in the queue for a long time to get a pasta. There was only one chef at the pasta counter and thus there was an unnecessary time and a long queue.
After coming to the dessert counter from a long queue, the desserts had finished . It took a long time to refill it back.

Instead of the finished dessert, the non-existent dessert was brought, so there was an unnecessary gathering of people there.

I hope the management will make sure that this kind of problem does not happen again.
Hopefully we will get a high level of service for what we paying .
title: Must improve the service and food quality of high tea.

placeInfo: {'id': '23958991', 'name': 'Granbell Hotel Colombo', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 897, 'locationString': 'Colombo, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.910313, 'longitude': 79.84873, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g293962-d23958991-Reviews-Granbell_Hotel_Colombo-Colombo_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://granbellhotel.lk/', 'address': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road, Colombo 00300 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '282/5 Kollupitiya Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Colombo', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '00300'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 44, 'count2': 22, 'count3': 29, 'count4': 87, 'count5': 722}}
text:
Staff were great
Breakfast was atrocious, very poor choice, all hot food was served cold, tables were packed together and there was obviously not enough sitting spaces to accommodate 30% of the hotel capacity 
Our outbound flight was late afternoon, our late check-out request was denied, which can be understandable if they require the rooms for the next customer, but upon check out we were told that we could not use any of the hotel facilities for the remainder of the afternoon, we were not to use the pool and showers facilities. Unless we paid an individual charge for the use of the facilities.  Every other hotel in the world we have stayed in has these facilities available for an out going guest. 
They were happy for us to sit at the pool bar,  and buy their drinks, but we could not dip a toe in the pool 
Higher Managment need to reassess some of their policies to bring this hotel into the twenty first century.
title: Good Staff but poor management

roomTip: Do have cash at hand, as the nearest ATM which is about 100 mts away does not work all the time. The next ATM is about 600-700 mts from the Hotel.
text:
I recently stayed at Granbell Hotel Colombo and was thoroughly impressed! The staff were friendly, welcoming and accommodating. The rooms were clean and sleek with the hint of Japandi designing theme sprinkled. The breakfast buffet was great and even had south Indian options which was very surprising and also very delicious.

A special note on the very helpful staff, especially Mr. Gyruka at the reception. My pregnant wife and I, we arrived really early in the morning. Even though they could not arrange for an early check-in, Mr. Gyruka made it work and offered us an available room at best price possible. We were just glad to not have to walk around and search for a stay at 4:45 A.M and be able to rest well on clean sheets. Also the bonus is definitely the WONDERFUL view from the rooms. The ocean looks breathtaking from the rooms with floor to ceiling window. It really feels as if you are only person in the world. The infinity pool which is on the 27th floor is beautiful and overlooks the ocen. 

For people wanting to travel by train, the Kollupitiya Railway Station is right next to the hotel. So the hotel is definitely very accessible.

I highly recommend the hotel to anyone seeking a top-notch hotel experience.

Rating Breakdown:

- Cleanliness: 5/5
- Service: 4/5
- Value: 5/5
- Location: 5/5
- Sleep Quality: 5/5
title: Exceptional Stay at Granbell Hotel Colombo!
